scripts.build:fa: mkdir -p public/assets/fa && cp -R node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css public/assets/fa/css && cp -R node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts public/assets/fa/webfonts
scripts.build:chartjs: cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.umd.js* public/assets/ 2>/dev/null || cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.umd.js public/assets/
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fa && npm run build:chartjs
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run update:dockerfile
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run update:dockerfile
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run update:dockerfile
